title: Chicken Prawn and Rice Soup
ingredients: ['85g small prawns', '85g skinless, boneless chicken pieces, cut into chunks', '1 egg', '4 tablespoons cornflour', '1 litre vegetable oil for frying', '750ml chicken stock', '30g fresh mushrooms, chopped', '2 tablespoons chopped water chestnuts', '3 tablespoons diced bamboo shoots', '35g fresh green beans, cut into 2.5cm pieces', '1/2 teaspoon salt', '1 tablespoon sherry', '125g uncooked white rice']
